name: crytop
description: A simple encryption tool powered by Web Crypto API

scripts.prepack: npm run version:up && npm start && npm run version:down
scripts.start:main: tsc -d -m umd --outDir dist && node scripts/fixumd.js dist/crytop.js
scripts.start:module: tsc -m esnext && mv src/crytop.js dist/crytop.esm.js && cp dist/crytop.d.ts dist/crytop.esm.d.ts
scripts.start: npm run start:main && npm run start:module

author: lamartinecabral
